text: Love Finds a Way is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithLove Finds a WayRichard Schickel. D.W. Griffith: An American Life and stars Anita Hendrie, Arthur V. Johnson, and Marion Leonard. ==Actors== * Anita Hendrie as The Duchess * Arthur V. Johnson as The Duke * Marion Leonard as Their Daughter * Harry Solter as One of the Daughter's Suitors * Charles Inslee as One of the Daughter's Suitors * Linda Arvidson as Lady-in-Waiting * Charles Avery as Plotter * John R. Cumpson as Footman * George Gebhardt as Plotter * David Miles as Minister * Mack Sennett as Footman * Charles West * Dorothy West as Lady-in-Waiting ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: Love Finds a Way
